name: The Doomsday Witch
description:
The girl who had to save the world, the heroine that everyone admired for her extraordinary magical skills, the chosen one according to many... she was the one who brought the world to ruin. Everyone now knows her as the "doomsday witch". Since the catastrophe occurred, no one heard from her, three years in which humanity hated her deeply... until one day, a child went looking for her. A second chance was about to present itself to Mira: can her fate change?

Game Features:

  • Discover the mystery of the Doomsday Witch and get involved in this story thanks to a cast of unique characters! 
  • No more battles! Instead, we've to rescue wounded creatures, who desperately need cures and healings: they will be grateful to you.
  • A short game experience ideal for those who want to spend a couple of hours having fun!

N.B. English is not my language, if there are any grammatical errors please let me know. I tried to do my best. 

Info about the Just RTP Only Jam:

Engine: RPG Maker MZ
Theme: In Search for a Miracle
Genre: Fantasy
